content: in first st of the round a half_double_crochet and pink marker in last st of the round a slip_stitch photo 19 skip the joining slip_stitch from prev round and the tch and join via slip_stitch marked st and move marker up in this slip_stitch half_double_crochet in next st repeat photo 16 photo 17 from * around slip_stitch in next st half_double_crochet in next st until you reach last st marked with yellow marker slip_stitch in this st move yellow marker in first st of the round a half_double_crochet and pink marker in last st of the round a slip_stitch skip the joining slip_stitch across until this has added 8 sts to your total stitch count 2 sts you reach next marked corner slip_stitch half_double_crochet slip_stitch in per raglan panel marked st and move marker up in 2nd st of the set repeat round 2 4 6 8 10 12 14 18 22 28 30 more the half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch times for a total of 6 8 10 12 14 16 20 24 30 32 in
